data.oai_dc:dc: This is a historical report, published in 1935 by A. Vatova. It contains specific information about a bottom sample that was taken once in the eastern harbour of Alexandria, near the Marine Laboratory during the floristical and faunistical survey of Adolf Steuer on the coasts near Alexandria mainly with the vessel “El Hoot”. The digitization of this report was done by LifewatchGreece team.|22 occurrences
